original_text: and the Lord uprooted them from their land in anger and fury and great wrath, and cast them into another land, as they are this day.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 진노와 격분과 크게 통한하심으로 그들을 이 땅에서 뽑아내사 다른 나라에 내던지심이 오늘과 같다 하리라

sentences.original_text: and the Lord uprooted them from their land
in anger and fury and great wrath
and cast them into another land
